marker.comment: On our son''s mooring East Greenwich Cove; grandkids onboard for 10 days!
Quick''s Hole, Elizabeth Islands, Cape Cod at anchor off beach
Cuttyhunk, Elizabeth Islands, Cape Cod at a town mooring
Newport Harbor, RI at son''s mooring. Foggy!
Anchored off Dutch Isl, Narragansett Bay, RI - 80''s,no humidity, beautiful!
Newport, RI - leaving after 30th Aug for South!!
Anchored Port Jefferson, NY at 9:30pm. 95nm day -- long!
Anchored Eastons Neck, NY @Coast Guard station, winds 25-30,move Thurs again.
Anchored Manisquan Inlet, NJ-good days run w/wind and currents in favor!
Anchored Cape May, NJ -- tomorrow to Norfolk,VA coastal run.
Free dock, Great Bridge, VA, 12nm south of Norfolk. Grocery shopping too!
Anchored just S of Coinjock, NC - to cross Albemarle Sound tomorrow. windy.
Anchored 10 mi N of Belhaven, NC in small cove. Still windy, less tomorrow.
Anchored in Bond Creek,NC at Phil and Gwen cove. Showers.
Anchored Oriental, NC for Thrurs/Fri. Sunny and beautiful!
